article.title: InfoReliance to Provide Consulting Services to Threat Reduction Agency
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: InfoReliance Corp., Fairfax, Va., has been awarded a time and material and firm-fixed-price contract with an estimated maximum amount of $9,179,734 for Microsoft Consulting Services (MCS) in support of the Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA) Directorate of Information Operations (J6). The contracting activity is DTRA, Fort Belvoir, Va.
